Healthcare Providers: Why Geocode?

Source: vignettes/articles/geocoding.Rmd
geocoding.Rmd
library(provider)


# Retrieve the provider data
mpop20 <- provider_mpop(1760485387, "2020")


# prov_address <- prov_2013_2020 |> 
#   dplyr::select(rndrng_prvdr_st1, rndrng_prvdr_city:rndrng_prvdr_state_abrvtn, rndrng_prvdr_zip5) |> 
#   dplyr::filter(dplyr::row_number() %in% 1) |> 
#   dplyr::mutate(rndrng_prvdr_st1 = gsub("[.]", "", as.character(rndrng_prvdr_st1))) |> 
#   tidyr::unite("addr", rndrng_prvdr_st1:rndrng_prvdr_state_abrvtn, sep = ", ", remove = TRUE) |> 
#   tidyr::unite("prov_addr", addr:rndrng_prvdr_zip5, sep = " ", remove = TRUE)

prov_address <- mpop20 |> 
  dplyr::select(rndrng_prvdr_st1, rndrng_prvdr_city:rndrng_prvdr_state_abrvtn, rndrng_prvdr_zip5) |> 
  dplyr::filter(dplyr::row_number() %in% 1) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(rndrng_prvdr_st1 = "4570 County Hwy 61") |> 
  tidyr::unite("addr", rndrng_prvdr_st1:rndrng_prvdr_state_abrvtn, sep = ", ", remove = TRUE) |> 
  tidyr::unite("prov_addr", addr:rndrng_prvdr_zip5, sep = " ", remove = TRUE)
  

prov_geocode <- prov_address |> 
  tidygeocoder::geocode(prov_addr, 
                        method = "osm", 
                        lat = latitude, 
                        long = longitude, 
                        full_results = TRUE)
#> Passing 1 address to the Nominatim single address geocoder
#> Query completed in: 1 seconds

prov_geocode
#> # A tibble: 1 × 12
#>   prov_addr latit…¹ longi…² place…³ licence osm_t…⁴ osm_id bound…⁵ displ…⁶ class
#>   <chr>       <dbl>   <dbl>   <int> <chr>   <chr>    <dbl> <list>  <chr>   <chr>
#> 1 4570 Cou…    46.4   -92.8  6.87e7 Data ©… node    6.39e9 <chr>   Gatewa… amen…
#> # … with 2 more variables: type <chr>, importance <dbl>, and abbreviated
#> #   variable names ¹​latitude, ²​longitude, ³​place_id, ⁴​osm_type, ⁵​boundingbox,
#> #   ⁶​display_name



map <- leaflet::leaflet() |> 
       leaflet::addTiles() |> 
       leaflet::addMarkers(lng = prov_geocode$longitude, lat = prov_geocode$latitude, popup = prov_geocode$display_name)

map
